  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Coord2D
    Represents a 2D coordinate with x and y components.
    Move
    the move class is responsible for moving the player and detecting collisions it is also responsible for changing the player's state based on the collision
    MoveEnemy
    This class is responsible for controlling the movement of enemy entities in the platformer game.
    MovePlayer
    The class includes functionalities for jumping, moving left and right, dashing, climbing, and interacting with game entities like coins, enemies, and spikes.
